house_listing.house_description: This 3+ level detached single family home built in 1962 has 7 bedroom(s), 4 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) , 1 car garage. Rooms include den, dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include patio, fireplace, air conditioning.

residential_listing_-_feature_details.rooms: Den, Dining Room, Family Room, Master Bedroom
